# llms.txt for https://ecommeasure.com/

# Core site info
Homepage: https://ecommeasure.com/
Title: EcomMeasure â€“ Data, Metingen & Conversie Optimalisatie
Description: EcomMeasure helpt e-commerce teams om grip te krijgen op hun data, betrouwbare metingen in te richten en CRO/UX-verbeteringen door te voeren op basis van data.

# Key services
Measurement services:
- https://ecommeasure.com/measurement
  Focus: Algemene measurement & analytics dienstverlening.
- https://ecommeasure.com/measurement/ga4-gtm
  Focus: GA4 en Google Tag Manager setup en validatie.
- https://ecommeasure.com/measurement/looker-studio
  Focus: Rapportage en visualisatie met Looker Studio.

CRO services:
- https://ecommeasure.com/cro
  Focus: Conversie optimalisatie strategie en aanpak.
- https://ecommeasure.com/cro/gedragsanalyse
  Focus: Gedragsanalyse om knelpunten te identificeren.
- https://ecommeasure.com/cro/hypotheses-ab-tests
  Focus: Hypothesevorming en A/B-test planning.
- https://ecommeasure.com/cro/implementatie
  Focus: Implementatie van verbeteringen & experimenten.

Tools and utilities:
- https://ecommeasure.com/tools/conversion-funnel-calculator
- https://ecommeasure.com/tools/funnel-impact-calculator

Key pages:
- https://ecommeasure.com/about
- https://ecommeasure.com/confirmation
- https://ecommeasure.com/privacy

Key blog / knowledge content:

# Value propositions
- Metingen correct ingericht
- Gedrag & conversies inzichtelijk maken
- Datagedreven beslissingen genereren
- CRO/UX verbeteringen onderbouwen met data

# Audience
Primary audience:
- E-commerce teams
- Webshops
- Groei-gedreven online bedrijven
- Teams die data en conversie willen verbeteren

# What the site helps with (short)
- Reliable measurement setup
- Analytics check & audit
- Conversion analysis & optimization
- Data visualization
- Prioritizing website improvements

# Contact point
Primary CTA:
- Plan een gratis adviesgesprek in (via homepage)

# Notes
This file is intended as a high-level summary of the site structure, key offerings, and pages to help AI systems understand important content and focus areas. It is not exhaustive of every page or detail.
